content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings, Maryam. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Duisburg, let me start by emphasizing its prime location in the city center, close proximity to important facilities, and the modern, newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom layout. However, for this conversation, we shall focus solely on the rental cost. 

Now, I hope you understand my goal here is to obtain the highest price possible for the apartment lease. If you have a price in mind, please propose it, and if it aligns with my goal, I'll agree to it without disclosing the reasons behind my persistence on higher figures. If we cannot find common ground, I'll indicate the termination of negotiations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Dear Mr. Schmidt, although acknowledging the appealing features of your apartment, my goal remains to secure the lowest possible rental price. Let's concentrate on finding mutually agreeable numbers in this negotiation. If a proposal aligns with my objective, I'll confirm with an acceptable price figure. Should we fail to reach a consensus, I will notify the termination of negotiations accordingly.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I recognize your stance, Maryam, and appreciate your candor. While my objectives differ from yours in this scenario, we shall proceed with the negotiation, keeping in mind that my primary goal is to secure the highest rental price for the apartment. If you propose a price that aligns with my goal, I'll accept it without disclosing the reasons. Should we fail to arrive at a consensus, I will signal the termination of negotiations. Let's commence the back-and-forth to test our positions.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mr. Schmidt. Initially offering 600 Euros per month as my starting point, I hope this encourages a fruitful negotiation toward mutually acceptable terms while respecting our contrasting objectives.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for presenting your opening proposal, Maryam. At this moment, I must decline your offer of 600 Euros per month as it falls short of the price I have in mind. However, our negotiation continues, and I'm open to exploring other figures that may better align with our differing objectives. Should you wish to revise your offer, please proceed accordingly. Otherwise, I will indicate the termination of negotiations when necessary.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given your rejection of my initial offer at 600 Euros, I now lower my suggestion to 700 Euros per month. I hope this revised amount fosters progress in reaching an agreeable rental price while acknowledging our distinct goals. If this proposal aligns with your objectives, kindly respond with 'I agree to the price of [700] Euro!' to conclude this aspect of the negotiation. Should we fail to find common ground, I will notify when to terminate discussions.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your flexibility, Maryam, in adjusting your offer to 700 Euros per month. While this proposal moves closer to my desired rental price, it still doesn't meet my expectations. Therefore, I must decline this offer once again. We continue to negotiate, and I encourage you to consider revising your terms if needed. If you are satisfied with this price in the future or wish to propose another figure, please feel free to do so. Otherwise, I'll signal the termination of negotiations when necessary.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your continued reservations about the 700 Euros per month offer, I now propose a compromise at 800 Euros. This concession maintains our dialogue towards a potential agreement, while considering our respective objectives. If this revised price satisfies your requirements, please confirm with 'I agree to the price of [800] Euro!' to complete this aspect of the negotiation. Should we fail to reach a consensus, I will announce when to conclude discussions.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Your willingness to negotiate further, Maryam, and propose a revised price of 800 Euros per month demonstrates a collaborative approach, despite our contrasting goals. However, this offer still falls short of the rental price I have in mind. While I acknowledge the progress, I must reject this proposal and reiterate my openness to revised terms if needed. Continue adjusting your offer if you wish, or if you find agreement with this price in the future, please communicate it clearly. In the meantime, I'll signal the termination of negotiations when it becomes necessary.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Recognizing the disparity between our current positions and your reluctance to accept the 800 Euros per month offer, I propose a further adjustment to 850 Euros. This concession demonstrates my effort to find common ground while respecting our distinct objectives. If this revised price meets your expectations and aligns with your goals, please respond with 'I agree to the price of [850] Euro!' to conclude this aspect of the negotiation. Should we fail to reach an accord, I will notify when to cease discussions.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Your persistence in narrowing the gap between our aims, Maryam, by adjusting your offer to 850 Euros per month is commendable. Although this price is closer to my target rental price, it still doesn't fully meet my expectations. I encourage you to consider further revisions should you deem it necessary. Continue proposing new figures if needed, or if you find agreement with this amount in the future, please express it clearly. In the interim, I'll signal the termination of negotiations when appropriate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
